title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to weather and climate. Physics of climate. Impact of climate on environment. El-Nino, La-Lina, IOD (Indian Ocean Dipole), NAO (North Atlantic Oscillation), Arctic Oscillation, Indian Summer Monsoon. Precipitation and temperature change due to climate variations. Generation of extreme events. Water bodies on the earth and their variations due to change of climate. Relations among climate, vegetation and water.
